title: Take Version 58 live on ICP production and update version markers/docs

requirements.text: Update the frontend version markers to Version 58 so the deployed app clearly reports the correct release version.

quotes: Version 58 is ready — want me to take it live when you’re satisfied with how it looks?

acceptanceCriteria: After deployment, fetching the deployed app HTML shows the app-version meta content as `58` and the `/version.txt` asset returns `58`.

requirements.text: Deploy Version 58 to the Internet Computer production network so the live canisters serve the Version 58 build.

quotes: Version 58 is ready — want me to take it live when you’re satisfied with how it looks?

acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is executed using `dfx deploy --network ic` for the app canisters.
Post-deploy smoke checks confirm: (1) Internet Identity login works, (2) the Dashboard loads, (3) navigating to a resident profile works, and (4) no new blocking console errors are introduced.
The live site reports version `58` via the version markers (`version.txt` and the `app-version` meta tag).

requirements.text: Update the deployment documentation checklist to reflect Version 58 verification (version marker checks) so operators can validate the live publish consistently.

quotes: Version 58 is ready — want me to take it live when you’re satisfied with how it looks?

acceptanceCriteria: A Version 58 deployment guide exists (either update `frontend/docs/deploy-v57.md` to v58 wording, or add a new `frontend/docs/deploy-v58.md`) and includes: (1) checking `frontend/public/version.txt` is `58`, (2) checking `frontend/index.html` meta `app-version` is `58`, and (3) post-deploy verification steps for the live publish.
Any version numbers mentioned in the updated/new deployment doc are consistent with `58` (no lingering `57` references in version marker verification steps).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`; do not introduce additional backend services.

Do not modify files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or `frontend/src/components/ui` (immutable paths).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implement new product features unrelated to publishing Version 58.
Redesign UI/branding assets as part of this deployment.
Change backend schemas or add migrations unless required by Version 58 changes already implemented.
